snippet.title: Unreachable - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2487620/Unreachable/

A first-person investigative thriller where you play as Officer Harry Bernes, the famed detective of Fallstable County, as well as the target of an international crime organization. With your family kidnapped, you must carry out various demands from the kidnapper in order to prolong their lives, while uncovering clues to track down their location and devise a rescue plan.

This game requires attention to detail and critical thinking. You have been warned.

A game developed by Chu Boyan and Ali Fadlelmawla
UNREACHABLE IS THE TRADEMARK OF LOST ART STUDIOS LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
